name: manage-engine-service-desk-plus
label: ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus
description: ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus is used in turning IT teams from daily fire-fighting to delivering awesome customer service. It provides great visibility and central control in dealing with IT issues to ensure that businesses suffer no downtime. This connector provides automated actions to create, update, delete and close tickets

operations.title: Create Ticket
operations.description: Creates a ticket in ServiceDesk Plus based on the requester, subject, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Subject
parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Specify the subject of the ticket request that you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the subject of the ticket request that you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the description of the ticket request that you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the ticket request that you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Request Type
parameters.name: request_type
parameters.description: Specify the description of the ticket request that you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the type of ticket request that you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus. 
Request type can be Incident, Request For Information, etc.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status that you want to assign to the ticket request you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.tooltip: Select the priority that you want to assign to the ticket request you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus. You can choose between High, Low, Medium, or Normal.

parameters.title: Urgency
parameters.name: urgency
parameters.tooltip: Select the urgency that you want to assign to the ticket request you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Group
parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Specify the group that you want to assign to the ticket request you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group that you want to assign to the ticket request you want to create in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Requester
parameters.name: requester
parameters.description: Specify the requester name, in the JSON format, who is requesting the creation of the ticket in ServiceDesk Plus. For example, {"name":"Guest", "id":"3"}
parameters.tooltip: Specify the requester name, in the JSON format, who is requesting the creation of the ticket in ServiceDesk Plus. For example, {"name":"Guest", "id":"3"}

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Add Resolution
operations.description: Adds a resolution to an existing ticket in ServiceDesk Plus based on the ticket request ID and resolution you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket Request ID
parameters.name: request_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ticket request to which you want to add the resolution in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Resolution
parameters.name: resolution
parameters.tooltip: Specify the resolution that you want to add to the specified ticket in ServiceDesk Plus.

operations.title: Add Note
operations.description: Adds a note to an existing ticket in ServiceDesk Plus based on the ticket request ID, description, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket Request ID
parameters.name: request_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ticket request to which you want to add the note in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the note that you want to add to the specified ticket in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Show to Requester
parameters.name: show_to_requester
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox, i.e. set it to True, to show the note to requester. By default, this is set as False, i.e. it is set as a private note.

parameters.title: Mark First Response
parameters.name: mark_first_response
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox, i.e. set it to True, to set the responded date of the request/ticket. By default, this is set as False.

parameters.title: Add to Linked Requests
parameters.name: add_to_linked_requests
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox, i.e. set it to 'True', to add the note to the linked requests. By default, this is set as 'False'.

parameters.title: Notify Technician
parameters.name: notify_technician
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox, i.e. set it to True, to notify the technician when the note is added. By default, this is set as False.

operations.title: Get Ticket Details
operations.description: Retrieves details of a specific ticket from ServiceDesk Plus based on the ticket request ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket Request ID
parameters.name: request_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ticket request for which you want to retrieve details from ServiceDesk Plus.

operations.title: Get All Requesters
operations.description: Retrieves details of all requesters or specific requesters from ServiceDesk Plus based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Requester ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the requester whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the requester whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Employee ID
parameters.name: employee_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the employee ID of the requester whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Email ID
parameters.name: email_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the email ID of the requester whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select the type of requester whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify custom fields, in the JSON format, that you want to use for filtering requesters whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus. For example, { "name": "abc" }

parameters.title: Fields Required
parameters.name: fields_required
parameters.tooltip: Specify the fields required to be retrieved for the requesters you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus. You can specify multiple fields using a comma separator.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.tooltip: Specify the field using which you want to sort the requesters retrieved from ServiceDesk Plus. For example, name

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.tooltip: Select the order in which you want to sort the requesters retrieved from ServiceDesk Plus. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.

parameters.title: Start Index
parameters.name: start_index
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the index of the first item (requester) to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. 
Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1.

parameters.title: Record Count
parameters.name: size
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the maximum number of records (requesters) to be returned by this operation in a single request. 
Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1.

operations.title: Get All Open Tickets
operations.description: Retrieves details of all open tickets or specific open tickets from ServiceDesk Plus based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket Request ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ticket request for which you want to retrieve details from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Subject
parameters.name: subject
parameters.tooltip: Specify the subject of the ticket request for which you want to retrieve details from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority.name
parameters.tooltip: Select the priority of the ticket request for which you want to retrieve details from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Requester Name
parameters.name: requester.name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the requester whose open tickets details you want to retrieve details from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.tooltip: Specify the field using which you want to sort the open tickets retrieved from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.tooltip: Select the order in which you want to sort the open tickets retrieved from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Start From
parameters.name: from
parameters.tooltip: Specify the index of the first item (open tickets) to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Limit Upto
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the index till when, i.e. the last item (open tickets) to be returned by this operation.

operations.title: Update Ticket
operations.description: Updates an existing ticket in ServiceDesk Plus based on the ticket request ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket Request ID
parameters.name: request_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ticket that you want to update in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Subject
parameters.name: subject
parameters.tooltip: Specify the subject of the ticket request that you want to update in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the ticket request that you want to update in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status that you want to assign to the ticket request you want to update in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Urgency
parameters.name: urgency
parameters.tooltip: Select the urgency that you want to assign to the ticket request you want to update in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.tooltip: Select the priority that you want to assign to the ticket request you want to update in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Close Ticket
operations.description: Closes a ticket in ServiceDesk Plus based on the ticket request ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket Request ID
parameters.name: request_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ticket that you want to close in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: FCR
parameters.name: is_fcr
parameters.tooltip: Select this option if the ticket that you want to close in ServiceDesk Plus has been marked as First Call Resolution (FCR).

parameters.title: Has requester acknowledged the resolution?
parameters.name: requester_ack_resolution
parameters.tooltip: Select this option if the resolution of the ticket that you want to close in ServiceDesk Plus has been acknowledged by the requester.

parameters.title: Comments
parameters.name: requester_ack_comments
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comment specified by the requester while acknowledging the resolution of the ticket.

parameters.title: Request Closure Code
parameters.name: closure_code
parameters.tooltip: Select the closure code that you want to assign to the ticket that you want to close in ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Request Closure Comments
parameters.name: closure_comments
parameters.tooltip: Specify the closure comment to be added to the ticket that you want to close in ServiceDesk Plus.

operations.title: Delete Ticket
operations.description: Deletes a ticket (moves it to 'trash') from ServiceDesk Plus based on the ticket request ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket Request ID
parameters.name: request_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ticket that you want to delete (move to trash) from ServiceDesk Plus.

operations.title: Delete Ticket From Trash
operations.description: Permanently deletes a ticket from the 'Trash' in ServiceDesk Plus based on the Ticket Request ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket Request ID
parameters.name: request_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the ticket that you want to permanently delete from the 'trash' in ServiceDesk Plus.

operations.title: Get Request Task
operations.description: This operation helps you to get a specific task.

parameters.title: Request ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the request whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: task_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Task ID of the requester whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

operations.title: Get List Request Task
operations.description: This operation helps you to Get list of tasks.

parameters.title: Request ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the request whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.tooltip: Specify the field using which you want to sort the requesters retrieved from ServiceDesk Plus. For example, name

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.tooltip: Select the order in which you want to sort the requesters retrieved from ServiceDesk Plus. You can choose between Ascending or Descending.

parameters.title: Start Index
parameters.name: start_index
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the index of the first item (requester) to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. 
Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1.

parameters.title: Record Count
parameters.name: size
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the maximum number of records (requesters) to be returned by this operation in a single request. 
Note: You can specify the minimum number as 1.

operations.title: Delete Request Task
operations.description: This operation helps you to delete tasks.

parameters.title: Request ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the request whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: task_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Task ID of the requester whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

operations.title: Add Request Task
operations.description: This operation helps you to add tasks.

parameters.title: Request ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the request whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.tooltip: Title of the task.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the ticket request to create in ServiceDesk Plus MSP.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of the ticket request to create in ServiceDesk Plus MSP.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.tooltip: Select the priority of the ticket request to create in ServiceDesk Plus MSP.

parameters.title: Group
parameters.name: group
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group that you want to assign to the ticket request being created in ServiceDesk Plus MSP.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Edit Request Task
operations.description: This operation helps you to edit tasks.

parameters.title: Request ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the request whose details you want to retrieve from ServiceDesk Plus.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: task_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Task ID for this operation.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the ticket request to create in ServiceDesk Plus MSP.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of the ticket request to create in ServiceDesk Plus MSP.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.tooltip: Select the priority of the ticket request to create in ServiceDesk Plus MSP.

parameters.title: Group
parameters.name: group
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group that you want to assign to the ticket request being created in ServiceDesk Plus MSP.
